alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Inland Wakulla; Jackson; Leon; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 1:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Jackson, northwestern Wakulla, Gadsden, northeastern Liberty, southwestern Leon, Decatur and Seminole Counties through 230 PM EDT/130 PM CDT/... At 145 PM EDT/1245 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles southwest of Donalsonville to near Chattahoochee to 13 miles southeast of Blountstown. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Bainbridge, Midway, Quincy, Havana, Greensboro, West Bainbridge, Chattahoochee, Sneads, Gretna, Bristol, Grand Ridge, Attapulgus, Brinson, Rock Bluff, Juniper, Douglas City, Florence, Jamieson and Recovery. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Gadsden; Inland Wakulla; Jackson; Leon; Liberty
